nodes.bodyText: would you mind creating an issue for this that we can refer to in this PR as this seems to be clearly a bug, right?
I have created an issue  #2308 for the above.

nodes.diffHunk: @@ -403,7 +401,7 @@ public void testDeregisterDeviceFailsForNonExistingDevice(final VertxTestContext * Device Registry Management API - Search Devices */ @Nested - @EnabledIfSystemProperty(named = "hono.deviceregistry.supportsSearchDevices", matches = "true") + @EnabledIfSystemProperty(named = "deviceregistry.supportsSearchDevices", matches = "true")
